item.title: 系统设计的4大关键
item.description: Who are the Fantastic Four of System Design? Scalability, Availability, Reliability, and Performance. They are the most critical components to crafting successful software systems. Let’s look at each of them with implementation techniques: 1 - Scalability Scalability ensures that your application can handle more load without compromising performance. 2 - Availability Availability makes sure that your application is always ready to serve the users and downtime is minimal. 3 - Reliability Reliability is about building software that consistently delivers correct results.
